name: Dyed Tassel
title: Warrior's Legacy: Dyed Tassel
desc: "That ghostly blue wildfire of which ancient legends spoke would burn brightly anew on fresh fields of battle..."
in_play_description:
When the character to which this is attached uses a Charged Attack: Deals +1 DMG. (Once per Round)
After the attached character uses a Plunging Attack: Create 1 stack of Efficient Switch. (Once per Round)

skills.desc:
When the character to which this is attached uses a Charged Attack: Deals +1 DMG. (Once per Round)
After the attached character uses a Plunging Attack: Create 1 stack of Efficient Switch. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
